title: How do i level up in boards?
body: In league I am level 22, I started a couple weeks ago and I want to ask the community some questions but it says I have to be level 7?

replies.body: Sometimes there's a little bit of a mishap with player levels syncing to the boards for some reason, but I went into your account and you should be able to post on the rest of the boards. If you're still having issues with that, let me know or [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what could be causing that issue.
